title: Origin and Birth
description: The beginning of The AptS Project, discovery of Feedscatteron, birth of AptS:1547

content.text: 47 began to have deep dreams

I had a very deep dream
I dreamed I fell into the deep sea
I dreamed I flew across the stars
I dreamed of... what I looked like after death
Significance: The conception of The AptS Project

You once promised not to fall for my sake
And now I stand in this pool of blood
The blood mixed on the blade has long since dried
Significance: Foreshadowing the coming transformation
I will cling to you, forever
Significance: 47's persistence towards his ideals
47 conducts research on Feedscatteron and Fluid Titanium

Yo, 47, there you are
What have you been up to these days
(Looking at the blue liquid on the table)
No idea, meow
Progress: Technical research enters critical phase
Suburban factory exploded, 47 was burned
News report:

According to reports, at 17:26 today, an explosion occurred at a factory in the suburbs
The explosion caused the factory to collapse, but fortunately there were no casualties
Some blue substance was found at the scene, identified as Fluid Titanium...
47's condition:

(47 covers half of his burned face and walks towards home)
Almost done...
Significance: Despite the injury, critical materials were obtained
End of humanity, birth of Synthetic
What happened that day:

items: 47 witnessed his friend's suicide by jumping
Witnessed the powerful computational power of Fluid Titanium combined with Feedscatteron
Completed assembly of all mechanical parts
Cut off his own arm muscles and attached them to metal
The Feedscatteron Heart beat for the first time
Used a gun to end his human self

content.text:
(Upload complete)
(47 looks at AptS:1547 in front of him, expecting something)
(Silence)
(1547 examines the gun in his hand)
Yeah
(Trigger pulled)
(1547 holds 47 and lays him on the prepared bed)
Good night, my human self
Significance: Human 47 ends · AptS:1547 is born · The AptS Project officially begins · ESAP-TY-0000 (Unit 00) activated
Read the full story: AP0 - Origin
content.description: Detailed record of the day 47 transformed into 1547, the first beat of the Feedscatteron Heart

content.text: 1547 officially discovered and defined Feedscatteron
Technical parameters established:

items: Decay cycle at normal pressure: 34.28 seconds
Decay cycle in Fluid Titanium: 341,879 years

content.text: Significance: Foundation of synthetic technology established
ESAP-TY-0000 body manufacturing completed
Features:
Significance: synthetic technology system formed
